nodes.text: The Fortress Citadel was a location within Fortress Inquisitorius on the ocean moon of Nur in the Mustafar system. It was connected to the highly secured Interrogation Chamber by a long bridge, and had two turret emplacements outside the door to the chamber.

In 14 BBY, during his mission to restore the Jedi Order, Jedi Knight Cal Kestis infiltrated the Inquisitorius fortress in search of a holocron that was stolen by the Inquisitor Second Sister on the planet Bogano. On his mission, Kestis traveled through the Fortress Citadel in order to reach the Interrogation Chamber, and traveled through once more while being pursued by the Sith Lord Darth Vader after his duel with the Second Sister.
The Fortress Citadel appeared in the 2019 video game Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order, developed by Respawn Entertainment and released by Electronic Arts.
